    is_equal_to_sum_even(6) == False

    """

def is_equal_to_sum_even(n):
    """Evaluate whether the given number n can be written as the sum of exactly 4 positive even numbers
    Example
    is_equal_to_sum_even(4) == False
    is_equal_to_sum_even(6) == False
    is_equal_to_sum_even(8) == True
    """
    if n == 4:
        return True
    return False

def is_equal_to_sum_even(n):
    """Evaluate whether the given number n can be written as the sum of exactly 4 positive even numbers
    Example
    is_equal_to_sum_even(4) == False
    is_equal_to_sum_even(6) == False
    is_equal_to_sum_even(8) == True
    """
    # create a list of all possible n
    all_n = []
    for i in range(n):
        all_n.append(i)
    # find all possible sums of all n
    all_sum = []
    for i in all_n:
        for j in range(4):
            if j == i:
                all_sum.append(i)
                all_sum.append(j)
            else:
                all_sum.append(i+j)
        all_sum.append(i)
    return all_sum

        return True
    if n % 2 == 0:
        return True
    return False

def is_equal_to_sum_even(n):
    """Evaluate whether the given number n can be written as the sum of exactly 4 positive even numbers
    Example
    is_equal_to_sum_even(4) == False
    is_equal_to_sum_even(6) == False
    is_equal_to_sum_even(8) == True
    """
    return (is_equal_to_sum_even(n) and n % 4 == 0)

    Example
    is_equal_to_sum_even(4) == False

    return (n % 4 == 0 and n % 6 == 0 and n % 8 == 0)

def is_equal_to_sum_even(n):
    """Evaluate whether the given number n can be written as the sum of exactly 4 positive even numbers
    Example
    is_equal_to_sum_even(4) == False
    is_equal_to_sum_even(6) == False
    is_equal_to_sum_even(8) == True
    """
    # First, we make sure n is even
    if n % 2 == 0:
        raise ValueError("Incorrect number of even numbers: n % 2 == 0")

    # We divide n into four equal parts
    parts = n // 2
    if parts == 4:
        return True
    return False

    Example
    is_equal_to_sum_even(4) == False
    is_equal_to_sum_even(6) == False
    is_equal_to_sum_even(8) == True

def is_equal_to_sum_even(n):
    """Evaluate whether the given number n can be written as the sum of exactly 4 positive even numbers
    Example
    is_equal_to_sum_even(4) == False
    is_equal_to_sum_even(6) == False
    is_equal_to_sum_even(8) == True
    """
    # check if the number is even
    if n % 2 == 0:
        return False
    # check if the number is even
    if n % 4 == 0:
        return False
    # check if the number is odd
    if n % 8 == 0:
        return False
    # return True if the number is equal to 4 positive even numbers
    return True
